snippet: McTAGUE--Marilyn Ann. 1935-2016. The Caedmon School honors the life of former teacher and administrator, Marilyn Ann McTague. Over her 30-year career, she touched the lives of countless children of New York City. We are grateful for the many ways she helped to shape our school community. 1/3
lead_paragraph: McTAGUE--Marilyn Ann. 1935-2016. The Caedmon School honors the life of former teacher and administrator, Marilyn Ann McTague. Over her 30-year career, she touched the lives of countless children of New York City. We are grateful for the many ways she helped to shape our school community. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  MCTAGUE, MARILYN ANN
